original_text: But they are like plants that have not grown down well into the soil. So they only believe for a short time. They may have problems. Or because they obey God's message, other people may do bad things to them. When that happens, these people soon stop believing.
korean_text: 그 속에 뿌리가 없어 잠깐 견디다가 말씀으로 인하여 환난이나 박해가 일어나는 때에는 곧 넘어지는 자요

sentences.original_text: that have not grown down well into the soil
So they only believe for a short time
Or because they obey God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그들이 하나님의 말씀에 순종하기 때문에

sentences.original_text: other people may do bad things to them
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들이 그들에게 나쁜 일을 할 수 있습니다
